alert.note: Alert for Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 08 at 8:06PM EDT until August 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 615 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA DUVAL NASSAU IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON CLINCH ECHOLS GLYNN PIERCE WARE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, BLACKSHEAR, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HOMERVILLE, HORTENSE, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, JESUP, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NEEDMORE, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STATENVILLE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, THALMANN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
